EmailTemplate.subject: Stop Replacing DU-870 Displays with Spares!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Frustrated by failures and exchange costs on your DU-870 displays? Stop supporting your aircraft with spares that have a limited life span. Instead, improve your vision and add instant value to your aircraft by upgrading to Honeywell Primus Elite DU-875 LCD displays with Mid Canada Mod Center. Certified for Lear 40/45 and Falcon 900 EX/C aircraft, the benefits of upgrading include:
- Updates cockpit to latest technology with a quick "plug and play" display - Removes obsolescence issue facing DU-870 CRTs - Lowers your cost of operation - increases reliability by 2X and lowers weight by seven pounds per display unit - Brings a brighter, clearer, high resolution picture to the pilots that runs cooler and creates less heat in the cockpit - Operators can replace display units one at a time upon failure or all displays at once - Positions aircraft to later add operational features as part of Primus Elite upgrade such as electronic charts, advanced map, camera video, maintenance pages, and optional Weather XM® information
Plus, when you upgrade one or all of your displays you can take advantage of a limited-time $35,000 trade-in credit per DU-870 display unit (no limit). This trade in offer is only good through 6/30/19 so don’t delay.
